data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Import / Export

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: On this page you can import and export your vault.

data.name: ImportSectionTitle
data.value: Import passwords

data.name: ImportSectionDescription
data.value: Select a service to import from. If you are using a service that is not listed here and would like to see it supported, please raise an issue on GitHub or contact us.
data.comment: Import section description with HTML link

data.name: ExportSectionTitle
data.value: Export vault

data.name: ExportSectionDescription
data.value: If you want to export your AliasVault credentials to another AliasVault server (e.g. from cloud to self-hosted or vice-versa) or to another service altogether, you can export it here. Note that all exports are unencrypted so store it in a safe place and delete it when you no longer need it.

data.name: ExportCsvButton
data.value: Export vault to unencrypted CSV file

data.name: ExportSqliteButton
data.value: Export vault to unencrypted SQLite file

data.name: ExportConfirmTitle
data.value: Export vault

data.name: ExportWarningMessage
data.value:
Warning: Exporting your vault to an unencrypted file will expose all of your passwords and sensitive information in plain text. Only do this on trusted computers and ensure you:
• Store the exported file in a secure location • Delete the file when you no longer need it • Never share the exported file with others
Are you sure you want to continue with the export?

data.name: ResetVaultSectionTitle
data.value: Reset Vault

data.name: ResetVaultSectionDescription
data.value: This option allows you to completely empty your vault while keeping your account and email aliases. Use this if you want to start fresh after importing data from another password manager or if you want to clear all existing credentials to start over.

data.name: ResetVaultWarning
data.value: Warning: This action is irreversible!

data.name: ResetVaultPleaseNote
data.value: Please note:

data.name: ResetVaultCredentialsDeletedNote
data.value: All encrypted credentials in your vault will be permanently deleted
data.comment: Reset vault note about credentials being deleted

data.name: ResetVaultEmailAliasesKeptNote
data.value: Your email aliases will be preserved and remain claimed by your account
data.comment: Reset vault note about email aliases being kept

data.name: ResetVaultSettingsKeptNote
data.value: Your account settings and preferences will be preserved
data.comment: Reset vault note about settings being kept

data.name: ResetVaultIrreversibleNote
data.value: This action cannot be undone
data.comment: Reset vault note about action being irreversible

data.name: ResetVaultConfirmUsernameLabel
data.value: To continue, please type your username to confirm

data.name: ResetVaultContinueButton
data.value: Continue with vault reset

data.name: ResetVaultFinalWarning
data.value: Final warning: You are about to permanently delete all your credentials!

data.name: ResetVaultDeletionIrreversibleNote
data.value: This deletion is irreversible and cannot be undone
data.comment: Reset vault final step irreversible note

data.name: ResetVaultEnterPasswordLabel
data.value: Enter your password to confirm

data.name: ResetVaultConfirmButton
data.value: Reset my vault

data.name: ResetVaultUsernameRequired
data.value: Username is required.

data.name: ResetVaultUsernameDoesNotMatch
data.value: The username you entered does not match your account username.

data.name: ResetVaultPasswordIncorrect
data.value: The password you entered is incorrect.

data.name: ResetVaultProgressMessage
data.value: Resetting vault...

data.name: ResetVaultSuccessMessage
data.value: Your vault has been successfully reset. All credentials have been deleted and you can now start fresh.

data.name: ResetVaultErrorMessage
data.value: An error occurred while resetting your vault. Please try again.
